buttons.label: RR Setup process
buttons.response:
Reaction roles are setup via the dashboard

**1.** <https://arcane.bot/dashboard>
**2.** Navigate to your server and then "Role Management"
**3.** Create reaction role

buttons.label: Aren't assigning
buttons.response:
Make sure the bot's role is above the roles it needs to assign & has the `Manage roles` permission

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/848970700919799818/929505047417614416/unknown.png

buttons.label: Reaction types
buttons.response:
Arcane's reaction role feature supports multiple types. Some types require all reaction roles on the message to be the same type to work.

`-` Default: Add role on reaction & remove role on reaction remove
`-` Toggle: Add the role on reaction. Arcane will then remove the reaction. Removes the role when they react again
`-` Group lock: Users can only have one of the roles on the message. **ALL** reaction roles on the message must be set to this.
`-` Persistent: User can only receive the role. Removing or reacting again will do nothing
`-` Reverse: Same as `Default` but reversed. Remove role on reaction & add on reaction removal

buttons.label: Custom Command Variables
buttons.response: A full list of variables for custom commands can be found on the dashboard when creating a command

buttons.label: Custom Command FAQ
buttons.response:
**Slash commands?**
Soon!

**Can I disable a command for a role**
Not currently

**Can I add a role to the invoker?**
{addrole:roleid}

buttons.label: Custom Command Limit
buttons.response: Non-Premium users are limited to 5 custom commands per server due to abuse. Premium users have unlimited custom commands (<https://arcane.bot/premium>).
